sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import {
  Box,
  Container,
  Typography,
  Grid,
  TextField,
  Button,
  Card,
  CardContent,
  IconButton,
} from '@mui/material';
import { styled } from '@mui/material/styles';
import { motion } from 'framer-motion';
import EmailIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Email';
import PhoneIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Phone';
import LocationOnIcon from '@mui/icons-material/LocationOn';
import FacebookIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Facebook';
import TwitterIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Twitter';
import LinkedInIcon from '@mui/icons-material/LinkedIn';
import InstagramIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Instagram';

const PageHeader = styled(Box)(({ theme }) => ({
  background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #1a237e 0%, #0d47a1 100%)',
  padding: theme.spacing(10, 0),
  marginBottom: theme.spacing(6),
  position: 'relative',
  overflow: 'hidden',
  '&::before': {
    content: '""',
    position: 'absolute',
    top: 0,
    left: 0,
    right: 0,
    bottom: 0,
    background: 'url("/pattern.png")',
    opacity: 0.1,
  },
}));

const ContactCard = styled(Card)(({ theme }) => ({
  height: '100%',
  borderRadius: '16px',
  overflow: 'hidden',
  background: '#ffffff',
  boxShadow: '0 8px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.12)',
  transition: 'all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1)',
  '&:hover': {
    transform: 'translateY(-12px)',
    boxShadow: '0 12px 50px rgba(0,0,0,0.16)',
  },
}));

const InfoIcon = styled(Box)(({ theme }) => ({
  width: '60px',
  height: '60px',
  borderRadius: '15px',
  background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #1a237e 0%, #0d47a1 100%)',
  display: 'flex',
  alignItems: 'center',
  justifyContent: 'center',
  marginBottom: theme.spacing(2),
  '& svg': {
    fontSize: '30px',
    color: '#fff',
  },
}));

const StyledTextField = styled(TextField)(({ theme }) => ({
  '& .MuiOutlinedInput-root': {
    borderRadius: '12px',
    transition: 'all 0.3s ease',
    '&:hover': {
      '& .MuiOutlinedInput-notchedOutline': {
        borderColor: theme.palette.primary.main,
      },
    },
  },
  '& .MuiOutlinedInput-notchedOutline': {
    borderWidth: '1.5px',
  },
}));

const SocialButton = styled(IconButton)(({ theme }) => ({
  background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #1a237e 0%, #0d47a1 100%)',
  color: '#fff',
  margin: theme.spacing(0, 1),
  transition: 'all 0.3s ease',
  '&:hover': {
    transform: 'translateY(-3px)',
    boxShadow: '0 4px 12px rgba(26, 35, 126, 0.4)',
  },
}));

const SubmitButton = styled(Button)(({ theme }) => ({
  background: 'linear-gradient(45deg, #1a237e 30%, #0d47a1 90%)',
  borderRadius: '30px',
  border: 0,
  color: 'white',
  padding: '12px 48px',
  boxShadow: '0 3px 5px 2px rgba(26, 35, 126, .3)',
  transition: 'all 0.3s ease',
  textTransform: 'none',
  fontSize: '1.1rem',
  fontWeight: 600,
  '&:hover': {
    transform: 'translateY(-2px)',
    boxShadow: '0 6px 12px 4px rgba(26, 35, 126, .3)',
  },
}));

const Contact = () => {
  const contactInfo = [
    {
      icon: <EmailIcon />,
      title: 'Email Us',
      content: 'info@college.edu',
      description: "We'll respond within 24 hours",
    },
    {
      icon: <PhoneIcon />,
      title: 'Call Us',
      content: '+1 (555) 123-4567',
      description: 'Mon-Fri from 8am to 5pm',
    },
    {
      icon: <LocationOnIcon />,
      title: 'Visit Us',
      content: '123 College Street',
      description: 'New York, NY 10001',
    },
  ];

  return (
    <Box>
      <PageHeader>
        <Container>
          <motion.div
            initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}
            animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
            transition={{ duration: 0.8 }}
          >
            <Typography 
              variant="h2" 
              color="white" 
              gutterBottom
              sx={{ 
                fontWeight: 800,
                textAlign: 'center',
                textShadow: '0 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)',
              }}
            >
              Get in Touch
            </Typography>
            <Typography 
              variant="h5" 
              color="rgba(255,255,255,0.9)" 
              textAlign="center"
              sx={{ maxWidth: 800, mx: 'auto' }}
            >
              We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible
            </Typography>
          </motion.div>
        </Container>
      </PageHeader>

      <Container sx={{ mb: 8 }}>
        <Grid container spacing={4}>
          {contactInfo.map((info, index) => (
            <Grid item xs={12} md={4} key={index}>
              <motion.div
                initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}
                animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
                transition={{ duration: 0.5, delay: index * 0.2 }}
              >
                <ContactCard>
                  <CardContent sx={{ p: 4, textAlign: 'center' }}>
                    <InfoIcon>
                      {info.icon}
                    </InfoIcon>
                    <Typography 
                      variant="h5" 
                      gutterBottom
                      sx={{ fontWeight: 600 }}
                    >
                      {info.title}
                    </Typography>
                    <Typography 
                      variant="h6" 
                      gutterBottom
                      sx={{ 
                        color: theme => theme.palette.primary.main,
                        fontWeight: 500,
                      }}
                    >
                      {info.content}
                    </Typography>
                    <Typography 
                      variant="body2" 
                      color="text.secondary"
                    >
                      {info.description}
                    </Typography>
                  </CardContent>
                </ContactCard>
              </motion.div>
            </Grid>
          ))}
        </Grid>

        <Box sx={{ mt: 8 }}>
          <Grid container spacing={6}>
            <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
              <motion.div
                initial={{ opacity: 0, x: -50 }}
                animate={{ opacity: 1, x: 0 }}
                transition={{ duration: 0.8 }}
              >
                <Typography 
                  variant="h3" 
                  gutterBottom
                  sx={{ 
                    fontWeight: 800,
                    background: 'linear-gradient(45deg, #1a237e, #0d47a1)',
                    WebkitBackgroundClip: 'text',
                    WebkitTextFillColor: 'transparent',
                  }}
                >
                  Send us a Message
                </Typography>
                <Typography 
                  variant="body1" 
                  paragraph
                  sx={{ 
                    color: 'text.secondary',
                    mb: 4,
                    lineHeight: 1.8,
                  }}
                >
                  Have a question or want to learn more about our programs? 
                  Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you shortly.
                </Typography>
                <form>
                  <Grid container spacing={3}>
                    <Grid item xs={12} sm={6}>
                      <StyledTextField
                        fullWidth
                        label="First Name"
                        variant="outlined"
                      />
                    </Grid>
                    <Grid item xs={12} sm={6}>
                      <StyledTextField
                        fullWidth
                        label="Last Name"
                        variant="outlined"
                      />
                    </Grid>
                    <Grid item xs={12}>
                      <StyledTextField
                        fullWidth
                        label="Email"
                        variant="outlined"
                        type="email"
                      />
                    </Grid>
                    <Grid item xs={12}>
                      <StyledTextField
                        fullWidth
                        label="Subject"
                        variant="outlined"
                      />
                    </Grid>
                    <Grid item xs={12}>
                      <StyledTextField
                        fullWidth
                        label="Message"
                        variant="outlined"
                        multiline
                        rows={4}
                      />
                    </Grid>
                    <Grid item xs={12}>
                      <SubmitButton 
                        fullWidth
                        size="large"
                      >
                        Send Message
                      </SubmitButton>
                    </Grid>
                  </Grid>
                </form>
              </motion.div>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
              <motion.div
                initial={{ opacity: 0, x: 50 }}
                animate={{ opacity: 1, x: 0 }}
                transition={{ duration: 0.8 }}
              >
                <Box sx={{ height: '100%', minHeight: 400 }}>
                  <iframe
                    title="College Location"
                    src="https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m18!1m12!1m3!1d3022.1!2d-73.9!3d40.7!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x0%3A0x0!2zM40zMDA!5e0!3m2!1sen!2sus!4v1"
                    width="100%"
                    height="100%"
                    style={{ 
                      border: 0,
                      borderRadius: '16px',
                      boxShadow: '0 8px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.12)',
                    }}
                    allowFullScreen=""
                    loading="lazy"
                  />
                </Box>
              </motion.div>
            </Grid>
          </Grid>
        </Box>

        <Box sx={{ mt: 8, textAlign: 'center' }}>
          <Typography 
            variant="h4" 
            gutterBottom
            sx={{ fontWeight: 700 }}
          >
            Follow Us
          </Typography>
          <Typography 
            variant="body1" 
            paragraph
            sx={{ 
              color: 'text.secondary',
              maxWidth: 600,
              mx: 'auto',
              mb: 4,
            }}
          >
            Stay connected with us on social media for the latest updates and news
          </Typography>
          <Box>
            <SocialButton>
              <FacebookIcon />
            </SocialButton>
            <SocialButton>
              <TwitterIcon />
            </SocialButton>
            <SocialButton>
              <LinkedInIcon />
            </SocialButton>
            <SocialButton>
              <InstagramIcon />
            </SocialButton>
          </Box>
        </Box>
      </Container>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Contact;
